name: Everblog
body:
### Welcome to Everblog.
Everblog allows you to write notes in your Evernote and sync them to your blog.


### Authors and Contributors
Author: Tyler Long (@tylerlong); home page: http://tylerlong.me

Contributors:
Your names here.


### Support or Contact
You can send messages to me on github.
tagline: Everblog, write blog entries in your Evernote.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
